comments.comment: Felix and Marzia look so happy together, truly one of the most wholesome duos out there.
Pewds literally won life.
I love how Felix can freely walk on the streets of Japan without being bombarded by fans every minute, I'm happy for him

- i don't know if you guys know this, but whenever we can see shots of Felix and Marzia walking together, it's actually Bjorn filming them. 
- such a talented kid, he's gonna be a great filmmaker one day.
Björn is the happiest little baby I’ve ever seen  my heart can't handle it

I don't wonder why Bjorn is such a happy baby at all. Felix and Marzia have been showering him in love and affection and I just know that he's gonna grow up to be an amazing person just like his parents
Björn experienced more stuff in 6 months than I did in my 19 years
From screaming at barrels to being a loving and caring father. Thank you Felix. And may peace be with you and your family.
last brofist of 2023 see y'all in the new year
In this crazy clown world we live in, its nice to see a normal family just enjoying life.   You are truly living the dream Felix, and I hope yall the best life possible.
So happy for you pewds, from a gamer to an adult responsible gamer dad. "Bro Fist"
These videos feel like a never ending epilogue to a series I didn't want to end.
Marzia is the BEST editor in yt at the moment! I love the old style.. like watching a home made family film from late 90's to early 2000's. and the chill vibe
Ok but Björn is actually the cutest baby I've seen for a while and Ken is absolutely right his face is so round and cutee
i will forever love the “content creator growing with their audience” so lovely to see how Felix and Marzia are doing in life alongside my own
I love how his channel has developed into something so wholesome. A father sharing the story of his family. Thank you  for sharing Felix.
I love that he always carries the baby when they do a big activity like hiking so marzia can enjoy it too
Man it’s so wholesome seeing Felix and Marzia live their best lives with Björn and the doggies
can't believe I started watching him when I was 10, and now I'm 21. I'm seriously loving the glow up for both of us.

Baby Bjorn, the baby to an Italian mother, Swedish father, speaking English, in Japan.
Beautiful son with the most beautiful eyes and wonderful parents

Among so many alpha male role models biting at bricks and s*hits, it's nice to see a positive family role model. Seeing how close you three are is more enjoyable than watching a Christmas movie. I want to hug you so much, Happy new year!
We love you Felix, Marzia and Björn. You guys deserve the peace and happiness that has come to you, and we’re all grateful that you continue to share small slices of it with us.
I cannot explain the level of joy I have from seeing you and Marzia be parents and the love your little family has <3
I've never smiled so warmly watching something on the internet ever. Makes me wanna be a dad all the sooner :)
When Bjorn gets older he's going to have so many interesting memories and stories. Being raised in Japan by a Swede and an Italian that speak English together. Such an international start to life!
It genuinely makes me happy seeing Björn, marzia and you living your best life. God jul!
Hey Felix, don't know if you'll ever see this, but I'm hoping you and the family are well after the earthquake in Japan. Be safe
These vlogs are the reason why him retiring is not such a bad thing
This is like getting a glimpse into what happens after the happy ever after and I gotta say they deserve it.

I love seeing Marzia edit these videos. Makes me feel like we’re still watching her channel a little. Still not over it  she was my fav YouTuber. It’s so nice to see such a cozy and loving Christmas. I hope one day I will have this! ️
This video made my year. Just seeing Felix being himself makes me wanna cry out of joy.
Pewds I literally tear up thinking how wholesome and happy this really is. Your family is beautiful. So complete with baby Bjorn.

While I’m sure we all miss Felix uploading like he used to, I’m pretty sure we can all agree that he looks genuinely happy. Björn and Marzia are his everything and it’s so amazing to see how Pewds has changed and grown over the years!
…
So Felix, thank you for bringing us all so much joy over the years, and for continuing even though you’re retired. Happy Holidays and Happy New Year Pewds!

As someone who has a rough relationship with their family, I really love and appreciate Felix's vlogs. As sad as it is, seeing these makes me feel a lot better. Wishing Felix, Marzia, and little Björn a Happy New Year!!
While we live in 2023, Pewdiepie lives in 2024
It would be crazy the stories Felix would be able to tell to Björn when he’s older. I wish your family well Felix, Marzia, and Björn.
I'm happy that Björn is growing up with so many different stimulus, experience, and unconditional love from both parents️

I understand why Marzia took a step back from the public but I’m so happy to see her and Felix loving their best life. They deserve it. Seeing her in blogs with their lil guy just reminds me of her old channel which I miss so much.

I cried seeing so much of Marzia. I’ve missed her so much. Thank you guys for showing us so much of your lives when you don’t have to. I get so much joy seeing the happy couple and Björn. What a life you created, Marzia and Felix. Best wishes into the New Year. My goal is to be as happy & see as much of the world as you guys! :’)
pewdiepie has the best retirement and is literally winning at everything. Every single hater is just jealous
ever since they moved to Japan, it felt super laidback! so happy for felix, marzia & björn!

I'm waiting for the day Felix will put youtube on the shelf, and I won't be sad. This man existed with me through all of my childhood and we couldn't be more lucky. Felix, Marzia and Björn deserves all the joy and happiness! <3
Felix really is living the life, I’m happy for them
This video is so amazing. From reviewing subreddit shitposts to having just such a beautiful life. I’m so happy for you Felix.
12:55 The way Björn goes from unamused "whatever"-face to his eyes just lighting up with astonishment is my favorite part. Merry first Christmas Björn!
Watching pewds be a happy dad is bringing me so much joy, its ridiculous
Björn is literally the happiest baby I’ve ever seen
日本人です日本で、幸せそうにしてるのを見ると本当にうれしいです。春は桜、秋、紅葉沢山、きれいな所有りますのでたのしんで下さいね私は、大阪です。日本史でも有名な、茶道の千の利休、歌人の与謝野晶子有名な方が住んでいました。近くにも世界遺産、仁徳天皇陵も有りますきかいがあれば、また、来て下さいね
I love how much Felix loves being a dad to Bjorn and has him firmly attached to him ALOT of the time it's a thing of beauty xx

I just gotta say pewdiepie now doesn't feel like a YT channel. I feel like Im watching triple S tier facebook vacation vlogs. Very family based and quick highlights that never feel like they're intruding on the personal life or like you missed out on a vacation or moment because you were absorbed in your phone or camera. Its just a bunch of snippets of a lot of special moments and I love that

Seeing Björn take his first bite made me realise how many more milestones we'd be celebrating with pewds and marzia together. Makes me tear up :")
Merry Christmas guys!
watching Felix genuinely be happy about his son is so completing and heart warming to me. thanks for being the dad I never had poods. now have some fun with your beautiful family. :')
It makes me so happy to see one of my favourite content creators, while also being a YouTube legend, finding enjoyment in his life. Here’s to a new year pewds
best thing to watch to end the year off! thank you so much pewds
More people should strive to have families like this
Marzia is so beautiful. And her hair always looks perfect.
Prayers for you and your family Felix, also for the people in Japan.
Felix is one of the few who can be extremely successful delivering on one genre, then change gears and give us another genre and be just as successful. Love this content from Japan.
Haven’t checked out a pewds video in many years. Brings tears to my eyes seeing the YouTuber I spent my childhood watching everyday have such a beautiful and wonderful family. ️
I’m proud of him. It’s hard to make good decisions in this day and age especially while following your dreams. Just be happy for him
9:11 was the cutest thing I've ever seen, it's like Björn agrees with Ken and appreciates the compliment.
I was smiling my ass off this whole video. It's good to see felix enjoying life with his beautiful family. A deserved retirement after entertaining us for so many years.
I love how those videos have a touch of Marzia, used to watch her blog and this music and overall comfy feel is so familiar. Merry Christmas and an even happier New Year, Felix, Marzia and Bjorn.

Bye sobbing for a stranger’s baby is so embarrassing  The bunny ears clip and the clip where you bring up Ken really get me!! I am parasocially extremely happy for you and Marzia and your beautiful family. Your baby is so freaking cute and precious, his personality is so sweet and he is SO funny! Seeing you and him is so crazy. Since you are YouTube big bro it’s like such a trip seeing you truly be so great in a family with Marzia and I am again parasocially affected deeply by this. You are a great dad  Literally nothing but the best y’all. 🥹
Bjorn smiling all throughout is just 🥹

Felix talking about parental love just brings a tear to my eye, super proud to see what he's accomplished all this years I've been following, and to see him super happy with his life right now... it's so wholesome :)

The quality of Pewd's adventure videos is awesome.  The essence of serenity surrounds his family.  I am glad to see them living their best life.  I can see why they moved to Japan.  The videos he is producing in Japan are astonishing.  Best PO for this country I have ever seen.

I didn't know there would be a day when Felix would say that babies are cute. I remember the days when he used to bash them.

Now, here we are.

I feel like I am watching apart of my family live life to the fullest. Makes me tear up. I'm turning 20 soon, and I remember the old days where he'd yell at barrels, cus in swed and just wow. I've grown up watching this man. Thank-you, Pewds. Bro fist

Man I remember watching Felix when I was 12 in middle school now I'm 22 with a house and a girlfriend and thinking of starting my own family man these vlogs make me feel like I'm hanging out with an old friend I grew up alongside

Seeing you walk around Japan living your best lives, brings tears to my eyes.
We were there last month on vacation for 3 weeks and visited a lot of places. We also had the honor to see Mount Fuji for 3 days straight. I can't believe that was just last month, time flies so fast.
It's such a beautiful country, you really can't compare it to anything else. 
Wish to go back sometime in the future. 
Also, we have planted a little Ginko tree in our garden. Hope it grows good and big. And I got so much inspiration from the Japanese gardens, I want to use that inspiration to landscape my garden.
god i love your style of editing, its so nice to see that you found a way to include your baby but make it respectful
Hope everything is ok in Japan Felix
Love how Pewds begun singing a well known swedish children song at 8:20 it's called Björnen sover = the bear is sleeping
I love your intro so much with your dog and your baby.
I will never be this happy
Imagine being able to have both parents home full time. What a dream for both of them and Björn.
I went here as soon as I heard of the earthquake. I hope they're safe and okay.
Also great seeing Marzia doing mommy things. You've got a wonderful family, Felix. Thanks for putting this video up featuring all 5 of you enjoying the holidays.
6:18 such a beautiful shot of pewds and bjorn. Never thought I'd see something like this looking back about 10yrs ago. Pewds, I'm proud of you.
Pewdie, i wish to you, Marzia, your kid and to everyone that see this message a great new year
Bjorn's face when he saw the Christmas tree lights was priceless
Bjorn hitting the lightskin stare at 18:11

9:16

“That bastard would say somethin like that”
14:12 Marzia looks absolutely gorgeous here. Genuinely stunning. I don’t mean it in a weird way either, but just as a compliment! She’s very very beautiful, and I’m happy for you bro.
I’m so happy for Felix and Mariza, they became such good parents and people in general. Videos like these are why I started making videos again, much love
felix didn't fail to make me cry out of laughter when i was small. and even after 10 years he's now make me cry out of joy and happiness. i wish him and his adorable family all the best!
it’s crazy that bjorn will probably speak, japanese, swedish, italian and english
18:22 Little Bear, is GIGA CHADING on the camera
It's so peaceful to see such a calm and peaceful life in such a chaotic world. Thank you for this. I hope you live forever
Bro killed me here 9:11 Baby fever is getting real
I hope your ok pewds, I can’t imagine the heartbreak and the fear you guys have to endure. Praying for you guys, please be safe from the earthquakes and tsunami’s
18:37 omg character development :D
16:06 Momo is dodging like a master in a souls game.
Little Bjorn is looking more and more like Felix. He looks like such an adorable happy boy. ️ Also, I really missed our friend Marzia. Hope this little family has an amazing new year!
yk time flies when ur fav youtuber who u watched for years has kid
I hope you guys are safe from the earthquake
Björn looks so big and healthy and what a beautiful family. happy holidays Kjellbergs. bro fist!

Bjorn is now called " Cutiekins".  He is such a beautiful baby.  And Felix I can see family really works for you.  You and Marzia have a beautiful home.  And I loved Santa toy climbing the ladder.  Things are so different in Japan.  I can see the quality and care in all things.  America has lost that in the name of consumerism.  Thank you for sharing food and culture with us.  It's just breathtaking.  I loved the mountain cakes too.  Merry Christmas.  And let's hom 24 us a better year for the world.
Some people have it all, infinite money, beautiful wife and now a kid
I hope little Björn had a good 1st Christmas
And there's me... smiling for 23 minutes watching this video...
Hope you're OK guys. With the earthquake and all.
I can't believe I followed this guy when I was 12 and 11 years later he's married and has a kid. Time flies too quickly!!
Bjørn is such a sweetheart. He has a sweet and happy temperament. Love to see you guys enjoying and exploring life.
Hope you are ok guys!!, I seen the earthquake and tsunami warnings and immediately thought about Pewds and Marzia and lil Bjorn stay safe!
Bjorn knows how to smirk  too adorable. He's always smiling.
- congratulations PewDiePie for 111M, you deserve a lot more.

As a Norwegian, it's lovely seeing so many familiar christmas traditions. 
God jul alle sammen
Your life is such a dream dude. You live such a wonderful adventure, everyday. Just know, you make a lot of us jealous, but we're all genuinely so happy for the THREE of you.
0:37 Felix: “maybe do a backflip or something?” Marzia:
felix we are all proud of you
Hey pewds, heard about the earthquakes that occurred in Japan, I hope you along with your whole family are safe and sound
I hope you are safe guys.
Merry Christmas and Happy New Year, Felix, Marzia, and Björn! All the love from the Philippines!
23:15 yoo, he is such a nice, kind and obedient kid.
Bjorn is a bundle of joy, I love his little humor, he's truly the cutest. I also like how Momo is running around Edgar, like a speed demon.
Checking on pewds after the earthquake/tsunami news, hope you are all fine. Prayers from India for Japan

It's so precious to see how beloved and adored Bjorn is. He's so blessed to have such wonderful and caring parents, and staying on track I'm sure he will grow into a kind, wise and honest young man. God bless you all, and merry belated Christmas!!

Japan is currently suffering from disasters.
We ask for your love for Japan and for your generous financial support.
